document.full_text: a california lawmaker said on thursday that what he called a maternity ward for chinese mothers who wanted their babies born in the united states showed the need for immigration law changes.
document.title: lawmaker blasts makeshift california maternity ward for asians
lines_and_colors: a california lawmaker said on thursday that what he called a maternity ward for chinese mothers who wanted their babies born in the united states showed the need for immigration law changes.
